name: Popcorn Fish Bites
preparation: In a large bowl, combine Pakora Mix with 1⁄2 cup hot water and lemon juice. Let stand 5 minutes.
Season fish with salt; fold into mixture along with zucchini.

Preheat large frying pan over medium heat; add oil. Using a tablespoon, drop batter into pan; flatten slightly. Cook until golden on both sides. Serve with tartar sauce, Lemon Dilly Dip, or your favourite aioli.
tips: Make tartar sauce by stirring chopped pickles or capers into prepared Lemon Dilly Dip.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1⁄2 cup Sweet Potato Fries and 1 cup sliced mixed veggies.
